courses.description: This course aims to further train students' analytical and creative abilities, and cultivate their aesthetic awareness based on their existing Chinese language foundation. The course focuses on analyzing classics, which enables students to appreciate the aesthetics of literature and improve their analytical and appreciation abilities. Simultaneously, daily language phenomena are discussed to enhance students' language sensitivity. The course includes various types of writing exercises to strengthen students' writing skills, which would enable them to express their creativeness and thoughts. Students should complete this course within the first two years of their studies.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：

1. 透過增加對日常語文現象的認識，分析語言規律，並撰寫研習文章，提高語文應用能力，加強學生的語言自覺。

2. 藉欣賞、分析古今經典文學作品，提高學生賞析能力，掌握不同風格、體裁的文本閱讀策略，能夠精確且深入地分析作品的語言特徵和修辭技巧。

3. 藉不同類型的寫作練習，增進各種語文表達能力，撰寫具創意的作品。

4. 藉參與課外語文活動，建立終生語文自學習慣。

Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:

1.         Enhance their language awareness by increasing their knowledge of everyday language phenomena, analyzing language patterns, and writing articles to improve their language application skills.

2.         Through appreciating and analysing classical and contemporary literary pieces, students will improve their appreciation skills, acquire reading strategies for various styles and genres, and be able to analyse the language characteristics and rhetorical techniques in texts in a precise and in-depth manner.

3.         Through various types of writing exercises, students will be able to enhance their expressive skills and write creative pieces.

4.         Establish lifelong self-learning habits in Chinese language by participating in extracurricular language activities.
courses.course_syllabus:
內容包括：(1) 分析常見語文現象；(2) 古今經典文學作品；(3)寫作技巧及手法。

Content includes: (1) Analysis of common language phenomena; (2) Classical and contemporary literary pieces; (3) Writing skills and techniques
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 教師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。

2. 通過各種教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。

1. Teachers will frequently ask for students’ opinions on teaching progress, course design, teaching method and individual learning to modify the teaching policies instantly.

2. Various teaching surveys will be carried out to receive students’ opinions on this course.
courses.required_readings: 香港中文大學中國語言及文學系編：《中大‧山水‧人文》，香港：牛津大學出版社，2012年。
courses.recommended_readings:
1. 小思編：《香港文學散步》（增訂版），香港：商務印書館，2007年。
2. 呂叔湘主編：《現代漢語八百詞》，北京：商務印書館，1980年。
3. 孫紹振：《孫紹振古典散文解讀全編》，上海：上海教育出版社，2021年。
4. 孫紹振：《審美閱讀十五講》，北京：北京大學出版社，2019年。
5. 康寶文、萬波、張詠梅主編：《語文求真》，香港：三聯書店（香港）有限公司，2008年。
6. 楊興安：《散文賞析與寫作》，香港：豐文出版有限公司，2016年。
7. 樊善標、陳燕遐、馬輝洪主編：《二十一世紀中大的一日》，香港：香港中文大學香港文學研究中心，2015年。
8. 謝耀基：《現代漢語歐化語法概論》，香港：光明圖書公司，1990年。

courses.description: This course aims to further train students' analytical and argumentative skills, as well as conveying abilities based on their existing Chinese language foundation. The course focuses on in-depth analysis and commentary of classics, allowing students to have precise understanding of the meanings and expressions, thereby evaluating the content and techniques of the classics. The course covers various Chinese special topics, such as classical and modern literature, cultural thoughts, practical applications etc. It enables students to master writing skills and enhance communication techniques to improve their Chinese literacy. Students should complete this course within the first two years of their studies.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：

1. 藉精讀古今經典文學作品，理解其中的深層意義與文化元素，提高分析與評價能力。

2. 藉各種寫作練習，提升思辨能力，撰寫具說服力的文章。

3. 藉各種中文專題，掌握不同傳意技巧。

4. 藉參與課外語文活動，建立終生語文自學習慣。

Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:

1.         Enhance their analytical and evaluative skills through the intensive reading of classical and contemporary literary pieces to understand their deeper meanings and cultural elements.

2.         Enhance their critical thinking skills and write persuasive essays through various writing exercises.

3.         Master different communication skills through various special topics in Chinese.

4.         Establish lifelong self-learning habits in Chinese language by participating in extracurricular language activities.
courses.course_syllabus:
內容包括：(1)古今經典文學作品的賞析及評價； (2)中文專題。

Content includes: (1) Appreciation and evaluation of classical and contemporary literary pieces; (2) Special topics in Chinese
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 教師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。

2. 通過各種教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。

1. Teachers will frequently ask for students’ opinions on teaching progress, course design, teaching method and individual learning to modify the teaching policies instantly.

2. Various teaching surveys will be carried out to receive students’ opinions on this course.
courses.required_readings:
1. 香港城市大學語文學部：《中文傳意‧基礎篇》，香港：香港城市大學出版社，2001年。
2. 徐中玉、齊森華、譚帆主編：《大學語文》(第十一版)，上海 : 華東師範大學出版社，2018年。
courses.recommended_readings:
1. 王聘興、趙總寬等：《文章與邏輯》，北京：北京出版社，1982年。
2. 蔡伯盈：《從段落到篇章：學術寫作析論技巧》，台北：臺大出版中心，2010年。
3. Fisher, A.，林葦芸譯：《批判思考導論》，高雄：巨流圖書股份有限公司，2010年。
4. 陳碧月：《小說欣賞入門》，台北：五南圖書出版股份有限公司，2005年。
5. 王濱、馬知遙：《影評寫作理論與實踐》，北京：中國戲劇出版社，2006年。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: University Chinese I
courses.description: Course objectives: This course aims to sharpen students’ awareness of their own language and to intensify their sensitivity towards language in general. All students are recommended to complete the course in the first two years.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：   
1. 提高語言自覺、語文自學能力，掌握漢語字、詞、句的特點及修辭技巧，並能正確運用。  
   
2. 掌握議論思辨的技巧，提高說明及表達能力，建立批判性思維，俾能撰寫具說服力的議論文章，又能在口語溝通中應對自如。  
   
3. 掌握觀察技巧，提高組織能力，並能學以致用，因應社會所需，撰寫各類實用文書。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course Outline:Topics include: 1. Modern and Classical Chinese; 2. electronic resources for Chinese learning; 3. observation skills in writing, etc.  
   
科目大綱：內容包括：(1)古代及現代漢語知識；(2)工具書及網上電子資源；(3)觀察事物及組織描寫的技巧，包括觀察之角度、描寫之層次、重點等。
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 教學問卷  
   
2. 網上教學調查  
   
3. 收集網上討論區學生意見

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Communication in Chinese
courses.description: This course is designed to enhance students’ written communication skills. Ancient and modern essays are taught, by which students can study ancient and modern Chinese grammar, vocabulary and structure and strengthen their language skills. To address the daily language needs of students, special emphasis will be placed on practical writing and writing in different geners. Online language learning tools will be introduced to the students to enhance their self-learning ability.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of the course, students will be able to:  
   
(1) To acquire written Chinese communication skills  
   
(2) To enhance the self-learning strategies through online language learning  
   
   
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
(1) 掌握書面傳意技巧﹕  
   
(2) 建立網上自學能力，培養持續學習的習慣。
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1.導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、科目設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2.為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3.利用小組討論處理部分教學單元，俾學生主動學習，加強導師與學生之間的教學互動。  
   
4.通過教學問卷，全面了解學生對本科的教學意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: University Elementary Chinese I
courses.description: This course is specially designed to lead students to a more advanced use of the Chinese language. It aims to consolidate students with the fundamental linguistic knowledge in various aspects. It enhances students' ability of language use, through selected linguistic disscussions and practical situations.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of the course, students will be able to:  
   
[1] To acqurie basic linguistic knowledge of Chinese and to apply the knowledge in appropriate contexts.  
   
[2] To appreciate the Chinese language through readings of Chinese literature  
   
[3] To improve the self-learning strategies to raise the language ability   
   
   
修畢本科後，學生能︰    
[1] 掌握基本漢語知識，準確運用詞語和句式  
   
[2] 通過文學作品欣賞漢語特點  
   
[3] 善用自學策略，提升語文能力

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Self-Learning Elementary Chinese
courses.description: This course is tailor-made for non-JUPAS students who are exempted by Senate from the Chinese language requirements for admission and are admitted on advanced standing to FYFD places at The Chinese University of Hong Kong. This course is an introductory course designed for beginners who do not have knowledge of Chinese, focusing on the methods of self-learning Chinese (including Mandarin, Cantonese, and Chinese characters). Students are expected to finish this course in one term and will be graded as “Pass” or “Failure”.
courses.learning_outcomes:
1. Acquiring the basic methods of self-learning Chinese    
　掌握自學中文的基本方法   
2. Being able to find and use relevant learning tools and references for acquiring spoken Mandarin    
 能尋找和使用學習普通話口語的相關學習教材和參考文獻   
3. Being able to find and use relevant learning tools and references for acquiring spoken Cantonese    
 能尋找和使用學習粵語口語的相關學習教材和參考文獻   
4. Being able to find and use relevant learning tools and references for acquiring Chinese characters    
 能尋找和使用學習漢字的相關學習教材和參考文獻
courses.course_syllabus:
本科包括以下的內容：    
1. Basic linguistic knowledge of modern Chinese 現代漢語概論   
2. Self-learning Mandarin 自學普通話   
3. Self-learning Cantonese 自學粵語   
4. Self-learning Chinese characters 自學漢字
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. Survey on E-Learning   
2. Collect feedback from the discussion forums online   
   
1. 網上教學調查   
2. 收集網上討論區學生意見

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Self-Learning Chinese
courses.description: This course is tailor-made for non-JUPAS students who are admitted on advanced standing to FYFD places at The Chinese University of Hong Kong and are exempted from the 6-unit Chinese language of the University Core Requirements for fulfilment of the Chinese Language Requirements and is delivered via the web. The online self-learning system devised for the course will consist of 12 components in two parts ( zì cí piān字詞篇 and jù zi piān句子篇). This course is designed for improving the Chinese language standard of the students concerned at CUHK, covering various aspects of Chinese, such as words and grammar, argumentative and descriptive writing in order to increase the linguistic awareness of Chinese. The students are expected to finish the course by taking part in an online- examination.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本課程後，學生能夠︰

* 掌握中國文字、詞法及句法的基礎知識，加深對相關文化知識的理解。
* 展現對遣詞用句及中文語法的語文自覺，提高應對不同語境的寫作能力。
* 掌握按個人需要及能力選擇及規劃語文學習的策略。

Upon completion of the course, students will be able to:

* Acquire the basic knowledge of Chinese characters, morphology, and sentence structure, and deepen their understanding of related cultural knowledge.
* Demonstrate language awareness in word choice and Chinese grammar, enhancing their writing skills for different contexts.
* Acquire the strategies for language learning based on individual needs and abilities.
courses.course_syllabus:
本科共分「字詞篇」及「句子篇」兩部分，共計十二個單元，每單元介紹如下:    
第一部分﹕「字詞篇」(六個單元)   
   
1. 漢字六書和流變：Linguistic knowledge of liu shu and the development of Chinese characters 認識漢 字的六書原理和字形流變   
2. 錯別字：Knowledge of correct and incorrect written forms of Chinese characters and reasons of writing errors 錯別字成因和類型   
3. 繁體字和簡體字：Different features of traditional and simplified Chinese characters and rules of forming simplified Chinese characters 認識繁體字和簡體字的分別，以及簡體字構造規則   
4. 同義詞和反義詞：Chinese synonyms and antonyms 認識中文近義詞、反義詞   
5. 漢語構詞法﹕Acquiring linguistic features of Chinese morphology 認識中文詞語的構成方法和分類   
6. 　閱讀理解（描寫文）：Comprehension of descriptive writing in Chinese 描寫文篇章閱讀   
   
第二部分﹕「句子篇」(六個單元)   
   
1. 漢語句法：Linguistic knowledge of basic Chinese grammar with a focus on sentence structure 認識基礎中文句語，以句子成分為主。   
2. 漢語關聯詞：Linguistic knowledge and usage of conjunctions in Chinese grammar 學習中文不同類型的複句及其關聯詞   
3. 漢語病句﹕Linguistic knowledge of common grammar mistakes in Chinese sentences 認識病句類型    
4. 中英轉換：English-Chinese sentence translation 中、英句子翻譯   
5. 　漢語標點：Linguistic knowledge and usage of Chinese punctuations 中文標點符號基本知識及運用   
6. 閱讀理解（議論文）：Comprehension of argumentative writing in Chinese 議論篇章閱讀

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: University Chinese II
courses.description: Course objectives: University Chinese (II) focuses on students’ practical use of language, refining their skills in employing different communicative strategies to meet diverse contextual needs. All students are recommended to complete the course in the first two years.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：   
1. 提高語言自覺、語文自學能力，掌握漢語字、詞、句的特點及修辭技巧，並能正確運用。  
   
2. 掌握議論思辨的技巧，提高說明及表達能力，建立批判性思維，俾能撰寫具說服力的議論文章，又能在口語溝通中應對自如。  
   
3. 掌握觀察技巧，提高組織能力，並能學以致用，因應社會所需，撰寫各類實用文書。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course Outline: Topics include: 1. communication skills; 2. discourse and text analysis; 3. argumentative skills.   
   
科目大綱：內容包括：(1)口語傳意技巧；(2) 篇章結構的組織方法；(3)議論思辨的技巧，包括確立論點、選取論據及論證的方法。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Creative Chinese Writing
courses.description: This course aims to enhance students’ writing ability by activating their creative thinking through different creative writing skills and extensive writing exercise.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：   
1. 掌握創意與寫作的關係，提高創意思維能力。  
   
2. 掌握各種創意寫作方法。  
   
3. 提高中文寫作能力，能夠寫作富有創意的作品。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course Outline: Topics include: (1) relation between creativity and writing, (2) observation and writing skills, (3) imagination of re-creation, (4) re-newization and de-oldification, (5) image and imagery, (6) sound and word, (7) writing beyond reality, (8) creativity in crossover of words.  
   
   
科目大綱：內容包括：(1)創意與寫作的關係；(2)觀察與寫作技巧；(3)再造的想像；(4)化故為新；(5)圖像與意象；(6)聲音與文字；(7)超越現實的寫作；(8)文字的越界創意。
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、科目設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3. 利用小組討論處理部分教學單元，俾學生主動學習，加強導師與學生之間的教學互動。  
   
4. 通過教學問卷，全面了解學生對本科的教學意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Oral Communication Skills
courses.description: Inter-personal communication is valued in modern society. Very often, eloquence has profound influence on the success of one's study and career. This course aims to develop students' competence in oral communication with simulation practices in different situations.
courses.learning_outcomes:
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
1. 掌握粵語發音、身體語言、人際應對等口語傳意的基本知識及技巧，並能恰當運用。  
   
2. 掌握不同場合、不同情況的溝通策略。  
   
3. 提高敘述、說明、說服、議論等口語表達能力，俾能靈活、有效地對應不同處境。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course outline: 1) standard pronunciation in Cantonese and correction of students' articulation problems; 2) use of body language; 3) listening and reciting; 4) skills in oral communication; 5) oral skills for social interactions; 6) skills in delivering a speech;7) oral report; 8) oral skills for a meeting;9) oral skills for lodging complaints and responding to ;10). oral skills for an interview.  
   
   
科目大綱：   
一）粵語正音及糾正發音毛病；   
二）身體語言之運用；   
三）聆聽及複述；   
四）口語傳意技巧；   
五）社交口語；   
六）事務演講；   
七）口頭簡報；   
八）會議技巧；   
九）投訴及答覆投訴；   
十）面試技巧。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Practical Chinese Writing
courses.description: This course aims to enhance students’ command of Chinese writing for practical usage by the means of interactive teaching and learning activities. The teaching content is designed according to the actual needs for their further studies and careers development in Hong Kong which includes personal letter, letter for administrative or commercial communication, proposal, report, slide presentation and email etc. Students will acquire the necessary knowledge on the criterion of proper expression from real-life Chinese writing examples as well as the standard format of different Chinese practical writing.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠︰

1.認識本地語境中實用中文的應用情況及特點

2.掌握實用中文寫作於遣詞用字、內容鋪排、行文格式等方面的規範，提高其實用中文寫作的表述能力；

3.選用適切的文體及得體的措辭撰寫中文實用文書，應對未來學習、生活及工作等方面的中文應用需要；
courses.course_syllabus:
1. 實用中文寫作通則 (內容鋪排、措辭及語氣)
2. 自我介紹
3. 撮要及電子簡報
4. 校園實務文書︰自薦信、應徵信及中文電郵
5. 行政實務文書︰公函與便箋
6. 商業實務文書︰計畫書及報告
7. 公關實務文書︰聲明及禮儀文書
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 通過課堂表現及習作，了解學生表現。

2. 通過教學問卷，了解學生對本科教學的意見。

3. 發放學科成績後，將邀請修讀本科的同學組成焦點小組，為課程提供意見。
courses.required_readings:
1. 陳耀南《應用文概說》，香港︰山邊出版社，1985年。

2. 公務員事務局《政府公文寫作手冊》(第三版)
courses.recommended_readings:
1. 香港城巿大學語文學部編著︰《中文傳意︰寫作篇》，香港︰香港城巿大學出版社，2001年。

2. 于成鯤等著《中國內地實用文闡釋》，香港︰香港教育圖書公司，2004年。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Nature Writing
courses.description: This course aims to introduce students to nature writings in different genres which not only help expand students’ vocabulary but also guide them to observe and appreciate the nature in daily life. Reflecting on the literary works, students will learn and be encouraged to fabricate their own accounts more expressively, meticulously, and imaginatively, hence improving their creative writing skills and literary sensibility.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon finishing the course, students would:

1. build up vocabulary and acquire various sentence structures related to plants and animals, making their own expression more accurate and colorful.
2. learn to appreciate nature writings in various genres and be familiar with different writing strategies, boosting both analytical and communicative capabilities.
3. practise appreciating nature more often in daily life, improving observation and raising aesthetic awareness, thus enhancing creative writing skills.

修畢本科，學生能夠：

1. 累積細描動植物的字詞句式，使其語文表達更準確及靈活多變。
2. 閱讀及賞析自然書寫作品，學習不同文體的寫作策略，提升其析論及傳意能力。
3. 捕捉並仔細描寫素常忽略之自然生態，提升審美意識，加強創意寫作能力。
courses.course_syllabus:
課程大綱：

1.    「自然書寫」槪論  
Introduction to Nature Writing  
2.    城市動物（市區留鳥）：加強觀察力，從平凡中發掘不凡  
Urban animals (resident birds): enhancing observation by discovering extraordinary in ordinary  
3.    城市動物（蟲蟻）：脫離習套，提高想像力  
Urban animals (insects)：escaping from banality to innovation  
4.      鄉郊動物：代入動物視角，啟發靈感，加強創意寫作能力  
Rural animals: how the change of viewing angle inspires new ideas in creative writings  
5.    植物（花卉）：結合科學知識，探索知性寫作的美感  
Plants (flower): the art of weaving science and literature  
6.    植物（樹木）：分析比較不同文類如何以樹為喻，掌握其寫作策略  
Plants (trees): analyzing the writing strategies employed by different genres in tree metaphors  
7.    山野遊蹤：學習以現代遊記的方式表達感興  
Hiking: modeling the lyricism of modern travel notes

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Classical Poetry Writing in the Modern Era
courses.description: Classical Chinese poetry is beautiful in its expression as the works of famed poets can attest. The reason poems endure timelessly lies in how they reflect the times. Classical poetry written by modern poets can especially reflect the interplay between tradition and modern innovation. This course introduces the methods, metrics and forms of classical poetry through appreciating modernly written poetry in juxtaposition with poetry of the Tang and Song dynasties. Students will understand how classical poetry written by modern and contemporary poets strive for creativity and innovation. They can then apply what they have learned to writing classical poetry that conforms to metrical norms without any loss of aesthetics, all the while instilling modernity and innovation in their creations. Therefore, the ability of Chinese and writing will be enhanced.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：

1. 運用漢語知識，掌握古典詩歌的格律及作法，包括平仄、押韻、對仗、句法之特點，俾能應用於詩歌創作。

2. 掌握現代古典詩歌遣詞造句的創意，加深對漢語詞彙、句式的了解，以提升寫作能力。

3. 掌握現代古典詩歌營造意象、創造意境的技巧，了解如何在舊體形式之中，表現新思想和創意，提高學生審美詩歌的能力，並能學以致用，創作具美感、富新意的詩歌作品，實踐古典詩歌創作的現代意義，提升語文能力。
courses.course_syllabus:
| 第一周 | 課程導論傳統與革新：古典詩歌的語文特點與現代意義 |
| --- | --- |
| 第二周 | 古為今用：粵語與漢語四聲及平仄 |
| 第三周 | 韻律的永恒魅力：古典詩歌的押韻、對仗與句式 |
| 第四至五周 | 典故的應用與轉化：古典詩歌意象的營造 |
| 第六至七周 | 漢語新詞的應用與融合：古典詩歌字句的創意與分寸 |
| 第八至十周 | 舊體新題：古典詩歌與現代生活及社會 |
| 第十一至十二周 | 古典詩歌創作寫作指導 |
| 第十三周 | 課程總結  新理想與舊風格：古典詩歌的現代創作 |

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Classical Poetry in Modern Language Applications
courses.description: This course aims to improve students’ writing ability by applying ancient Chinese language through classical Chinese poetry and modern writing materials. Students will learn how to apply classical poetry and its linguistic features to various modern daily writings, such as slogans, inscriptions, couplets and prose. This will enhance the literary quality of the work and improve students’ writing ability as well as language proficiency.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:

1. master the vocabulary and syntax of classical poetry, and improve the knowledge and application of the ancient Chinese language.
2. understand the language techniques and imagery characteristics of classical poetry, in order to apply to different daily writings.
3. master the writing skills of slogans, inscriptions, couplets, prose, etc. in order to improve language proficiency.

預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：

1. 掌握古典詩詞的詞彙和句式，提升對古代漢語的認識和應用能力。
2. 了解古典詩詞的語言技巧和意象特點，以運用於不同的日常書寫之中。
3. 掌握標語、題詞、楹聯、散文等寫作技巧，以提高語文水平。
courses.course_syllabus:
Introduction: Writing and Applying Classical Poetry in Modern Life

Classical poetry and slogan writing

Classical poetry and festival greetings

Classical poetry and elegiac couplets

Classical poetry and gardening literature

Classical poetry and art painting

Classical poetry and prose writing

Classical poetry and lyric writing

導論：古典詩詞在現代生活的書寫與應用

詩詞與標語寫作

詩詞與節慶賀詞

詩詞與哀詞輓聯

詩詞與園林文藝

詩詞與藝術畫作

詩詞與散文創作

詩詞與歌詞創作

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: The Literature of Love
courses.description: This course delves into the art of crafting eloquent expressions of love in the realm of everyday life Chinese Language. By employing thought-provoking writing prompts, students will learn how to express their complex emotions associated with love. Participants will also have the opportunity to articulate their feelings, thoughts, and experiences evoked by their engagement with carefully curated works of Chinese Language. Throughout the course, students will hone their skills in crafting various forms of literary compositions centered around the theme of love, including short stories, diary entries, poetry, lyrics, prose, and scripts. By actively engaging in diverse in-class activities, students will broaden their perspectives and gain insights into an extensive range of possibilities associated with writing about love. Moreover, they will develop the ability to critically assess their own work, as well as the writings of their peers, arousing their language awareness in catching every nuance of love-centered expression.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of this course, students should be able to:

1. Create writing works of various forms in Chinese with a focus on love as the theme.

2. Improve and refine their ability to effectively critique and analyze language by evaluating different types of works.

3. Master the types, contents, and writing techniques of love writing.

4. Acquire new ways to express personal thoughts.

5. Enhance their motivation towards their writing goals.

預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：

1. 以愛情為主題，創作不同形式的作品。

2. 透過評論作品 ，提升學生以語文評論的能力。

3. 掌握愛情書寫的類型、內容和寫作手法。

4. 獲得表達個人想法的新方法。

5. 提升對寫作的動力和興趣。
courses.course_syllabus:
1. The setting of Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound (SMART) writing goals

2. The subtleties of language expressions

3. Appreciation and evaluation of love-related writings

4. Proficiency in the use of classical and contemporary Chinese language

5. Exploration and comparison of different methods of language expressions

科目大綱：內容包括：

1. 設定階段式的寫作計劃
2. 以寫作表述情感的方法
3. 評論書寫愛情的作品
4. 古今漢語知識與應用
5. 探索與比較不同的語言表達方法
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. Perform an in-depth teaching survey to collect students’ feedback on teaching.

2. Employ online discussions to boost interactive learning between students and teachers.

3. Understand students’ achievement via class discussions, tasks, and essay composition.

4. Seek students' feedback on instructional progress, curriculum planning, and teaching and learning on a regular basis

5. Offer one-on-one tutoring to assist students facing learning challenges.

1. **通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。**
2. **利用網上討論，加強學生與教師之間的教學互動。**
3. **通過課堂討論、習作和文章創作，了解學生的表現。**
4. **教師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。**
5. **為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。**

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Modern Poetry Writing
courses.description: The course introduces the features and writing techniques of modern poetry, and leads students to write modern poetry with various topics on daily life. Through reading, in-class exercise, writing, and discussion on modern poetry, students are expected to acquire the creative skills and express their feelings and reflection about daily life in modern poetry writing.
courses.learning_outcomes:
修畢本科後，學生能：

1. 對現代詩的文學特徵有基本的認識

2. 區別日常語言與文學語言的差異

3. 對文學語言有更高的敏感度

4. 掌握現代詩的寫作技巧，並應用在創作上

5. 發揮創意，以現代詩表達感受和見解
courses.course_syllabus:
閱讀和分析現代詩作品，進行創作和討論。

一、導論（一）：日常語言與詩化語言

二、導論（二）：語言的多義性與文學詮釋

三、創作方法（一）：聯想與意象

四、創作方法（二）：節奏與結構

五、創作方法（三）：敘事與時空處理

六、創作方法（四）：擬仿與風格

七、主題創作（一）：現代圖像詩

八、主題創作（二）：現代詩與食物

九、主題創作（三）：現代詩與愛情

十、主題創作（四）：現代詩與死亡

十一、主題創作（五）：現代詩與性別

2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。

3. 通過討論同學作品，俾學生主動提出意見，加強學生及教師之間的教學互動。

5. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Academic Writing in the Humanities
courses.description: This course aims to enhance students' ability in crafting academic papers in Chinese within the humanities. Through diverse learning materials, including various essay examples and writing resources, students will engage in a multifaceted pedagogical approach encompassing lectures, discussions, and writing exercises. Personalized consultations and targeted language feedback will further support students in developing a strong foundation for academic pursuit at the university level and their lifelong personal development.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本課程，學生能夠： 

- 了解人文學科學術論文的特點；

- 掌握論文寫作技巧，例如文本比較、格式規範等；

- 運用恰當的學術語言提出論點及論證。
courses.course_syllabus:
課程內容舉隅：

1. 課程簡介與論文寫作及評鑑概述

2. 問題意識與資料搜集及整理

3. 從大綱到初稿的寫作過程

4. 學術語言與風格

5. 論文寫作案例分析

6. 論文修改與潤色

7. 課程總結

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Creative Writing and Literary Appreciation
courses.description: This course aims at developing a student's skill in creative writing. It also focuses on practical approaches to teaching creative writing in high schools. Under the instructor's guidance, students will have hands-on experience in creative writing, and in learning how to appreciate various literary genres by sharing their experiences in class.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學生能够：   
   
1. 掌握創作不同類型現代文學作品之技巧。  
   
2. 掌握評鑑文學創作之方法。
courses.course_syllabus:
1) Imagination and factuality in creative writing; 2) Writing and appreciation of modern poetry; 3) Writing and appreciation of fiction; 4) Writing and appreciation of drama; 5) Writing and appreciation of prose  
   
一）文學創作中的想像與真實；二）新詩試寫及鑑賞；三）小說試寫及鑑賞；四）戲劇試寫及鑑賞；五）散文試寫及鑑賞
courses.feedback_evaluation:

2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Chinese for Business Planning
courses.description: This course aims to introduce to students various kinds of commercial writing for business planning such as statement, proposal, budget, and management plan. It also heightens important issues such as data collection, case analysis, and the weighing of advantages and disadvantages that will be involved in the whole planning process so that students will be better prepared for such challenges in their future work in the commercial sector for strategic business planning.
courses.learning_outcomes:
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
(1) 學生從中了解各種常見商務策劃文書的功能；  
   
(2) 學生能夠了解各種常見商務策劃文書的應用特色；  
   
(3) 學生能夠掌握各種常見商務策劃文書之間的應用關係；  
   
(4) 學生得以明瞭商務策劃文書的語體要求；  
   
(5) 學生能夠掌握撰寫商務策劃文書的技巧。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Chinese for Business Promotion
courses.description: This course aims to acquaint students with various kinds of business writing for the promotion of better business in their future practice of marketing and advertising campaigns. It also prepares students with the requisite writing skills and specific techniques. Students will be conversant with all typical commercial writings for business promotion plus a better understanding of promotional target, conceptual design and media characteristics.
courses.learning_outcomes:
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
(1) 學生從中了解各種常見商業推廣文書的功能  
   
(2) 學生能夠了解各種常見商業推廣文書的應用特色及其優劣；  
   
(3) 學生能夠掌握各種常見商業推廣文書之間的應用關係；  
   
(4) 學生得以明瞭商業推廣文書的語體要求；  
   
(5) 學生能夠掌握撰寫商業推廣文書的技巧。
courses.course_syllabus: 本科目教授的課題如下：(一)商業文字與推廣文字；(二)推廣的目的和策略；(三)推廣載體與文體的關係和特色；(四)常見推廣文書：推廣信、宣傳單張；(四)圖像、映像與文字的結合；(五)宣傳文字的聲效；(六)網絡的推廣技巧等。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Speech and Negotiation
courses.description: Speech and negotiation, which play a key role in modern lives, are important oral communication skills. Effective use of the two skills is of great assistance to interpersonal communication, social interaction, commercial negotiation and crisis management. With simulation practices of different nature and in different contexts, this course aims to develop students' skills in delivering speeches and in negotiation with application in daily life and work context.
courses.learning_outcomes:
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
(1) 掌握演講的基本知識及技巧。  
   
(2) 提高敘述、說明、議論、說服等演說能力，俾能靈活、有效地對應不同的演講情境。  
   
(3) 掌握不同處境的談判技巧及策略。  
   
(4) 提高洽談、交涉、游說等談判能力，俾能靈活、有效地對應不同的談判情境。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course outline: 1) corrections for some commonly mispronounced characters and problems in articulation; 2) strategies and skills in delivering speeches; 3) appreciation and analysis of famous speeches; 4) practice in delivering speeches: speech in social occasion, descriptive speech, persuasive speech; 5) strategies and skills in negotiation; 6) analysis of negotiation cases; and 7) practice in negotiation skills: negotiation in daily context, negotiation in work context, negotiation for crisis.  
   
   
科目大綱：   
一）常見誤讀字及語音毛病糾正；   
二）演講策略及技巧；   
三）著名演講辭賞析；   
四）演講練習：社交性演講、描述性演講、說服性演講；   
五）談判策略及技巧；   
六）談判個案分析；   
七）談判練習：日常生活的談判、事務談判、危機談判。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Prose Writing and Appreciation
courses.description: This course aims to develop students’ skills in creative Chinese prose writing and in learning how to appreciate modern prose of different genres. By means of the analysis of works in modern prose, students will be equipped with solid writing skills and appreciation methods through various writing tasks.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科目，學生能夠：   
1. 掌握各種現代散文寫作技巧，提高創作散文的能力。  
   
2. 掌握現代散文欣賞方法，提高欣賞現代散文的能力。  
   
3. 掌握現代散文的文類特色和發展過程。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course Outline:  
   
Topics include: (1) different skills in Chinese prose writing, (2) genre features in modern prose, (3) methodologies of prose appreciation, (4) criticism of prose of different kinds.  
   
   
科目大綱：   
內容包括：(1)各種散文寫作技巧；(2)現代散文的文類特色；(3)散文的欣賞方法；(4)不同類型的散文作品賞析。
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、科目設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3. 利用小組討論處理部分教學單元，俾學生主動學習，加強導師與學生之間的教學互動。  
   
4. 通過教學問卷，全面了解學生對本科的教學意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Chinese Writing under Globalization
courses.description: This course is designed for students to enhance their Chinese writing skills so as to cultivate the ability of bilingual studies in the university. Special emphasis will be placed on differentiating Chinese from English in expressing the same concepts or ideas. In view of rapid globalization through internet in recent years and the primacy of the English language as an international medium of communication, it is necessary for students to grasp the essence of fluent, concise, and accurate Chinese. By extension, the course also aims to improve students’ skills at overall thought and expression. Learning materials used in this course encompass a wide variety of practical writings like newspaper articles, magazine reviews, as well as scholarly writings like research papers particularly with regard to globalization and international relations.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completing this course, students should be able to:  
   
   
1. identify fluent and natural Chinese in a scholarly level,   
   
2. write excellent essays in academic Chinese particularly concerning globalization and international relations in a variety of writing modes, and present, interpret and justify their views in a coherent manner.   
   
3. identify Anglicized (or Europeanized) Chinese expressions and recognize the extensive influence of English upon contemporary Chinese as a natural phenomenon, and  
   
4. understand the importance of the Chinese language in the study of international issues.
courses.course_syllabus:
Content, highlighting fundamental concepts  
   
   
- analyzing the language used in newspaper articles, magazine reviews, research papers and other scholarly writings in relation to globalization  
   
- translating key terms and expressions in Chinese and English  
   
- Anglicized (or Europeanized) Chinese expressions  
   
- writing short essays on selected topics concerning globalization and international relations

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Classics and Life: Appreciation and Application of Chinese Classics
courses.description: This course aims at leading students to study, understand, appreciate various works from ancient Chinese classics which reveal different aspects in human life. Related readings include Confucian, historical, philosophical and literary works. Besides empathising with our ancient sages, the course will go through and realize the invaluable experiences and thoughts which could serve as useful life guidance, ultimately let the classics to play their positive function for our lives.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of the course, students will be able to:   
(1) Have a good grasp of skills in reading ancient Chinese classics.   
(2) Uplift the level from understanding to literary appreciation.   
(3) Realize the profound thoughts in Chinese classics and evaluate their modern meanings.   
   
修畢本科後，學生能︰   
(1) 掌握中國古代經典之閱讀方法；   
(2) 由理解提升至欣賞之層次；   
(3) 了解經典的深意，評價其現代意義。
courses.course_syllabus:
(1) Introduction: Introduce the classification and content of “Jing Shi Zi Ji”, and the common themes of life in ancient Chinese classics (1-2 weeks)   
(2) Friendship and love in Chinese classics: readings include Shijing, Tangshi, Songci (3-4 weeks)   
(3) Career and encounters in life in Chinese classics: readings include works by Sima Qian, Tao Yuanming (3-4 weeks)   
(4) Parting and death in Chinese classics: readings include Chuci, Shishuo Xinyu (3-4 weeks)   
(5) Conclusion (1-2 weeks)   
   
(1) 導言：介紹「經史子集」的分類、內容，以及中國古代經典中常見的人生課題（一至兩周）   
(2) 從經典看友誼愛情：選讀古人歌頌友誼、感傷愛情的作品，如《詩經》、唐詩、宋詞等（約三周）   
(3) 從經典看事業際遇：選讀古人有感於事業際遇，如司馬遷、陶淵明之作品（約三周）   
(4) 從經典看生死離別：選讀古人有關生死離別的作品，如《楚辭》、《世說新語》等（約三周）   
(5) 總結（一至兩周）

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Food Writing
courses.description: This course illustrates the types and development of food writing. Through discussions of several types of works by writers from different regions, students could observe the various appearances and tastes of food, explore its connotations of literature, culture, region and history, and enhance students' creation and appreciation ability.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of this course, students should be able to:

1. To obtain characteristics of the types, main contents, and writing techniques of food writing.
2. To read, understand and evaluate the works of food writing.
3. To create the works of food writing in Chinese.

預期修畢本科目後，學員能夠：

1. 掌握飲食書寫的類型、主要內容、寫作手法等特點。
2. 掌握閱讀、評鑑飲食書寫的方法。
3. 創作中文飲食書寫作品。
courses.course_syllabus:
| 1.     Introduction: The themes, types, and development of food writing | 1.     導論：飲食書寫的主題、類型與發展 |
| --- | --- |
| 2.     The cultural significance of wine, soup, coffee and tea | 2.     啡茶酒湯的人文意義 |
| 3.     The stories of congee, noodles, and rice | 3.     粥粉麵飯的大小故事 |
| 4.     Emotions and memories of exclusive dishes | 4.     獨家菜的情感與記憶 |
| 5.     Local ingredients and special refreshments | 5.     地方食材與特色小吃 |
| 6.     Exotic cuisine and customs | 6.     異國料理與風俗民情 |
| 7.     Wartime diet vs. banquet | 7.     戰時飲食與大排筵席 |
| 8.     Ways of eating and social thoughts | 8.     飲食方式與社會思潮 |
| 9.     Novel topics: such as special diet and martial arts practice | 9.     小說專題：如特殊飲食與武功修煉 |
| 10.   Audiovisual topics: such as food metaphors in movies | 10.   影音專題：如電影中的食物隱喻 |
| 11.   Graphic topics: such as food blogging | 11.   圖文專題：如美食部落格寫作 |
| 12.   Conclusion | 12.   總結 |

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Plants and Literature
courses.description: Plants are often one of the themes in Chinese literature, and it is important to know the symbolic meanings of the plants in literature so that we can understand and appreciate literary text through the plants. This course aims to introduce students to the origin, forms, and contents of Chinese culture and literature through studying plants. Students will be able to attain a new perspective of Chinese literature appreciation.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of this course, students should be able to:    
1.　Understand the relationship between plants and Chinese culture and literature.

2.　To read, understand and assess the meaning of plants represented in the literature.    
3.　Learn basic research skills of conducting literature research and enhance writing skills.

預期修畢本科目後，學員能夠：  
1.　認識植物與中國傳統文化、文學的關係。

2.　認識文學中各種植物的形態和意涵，理解作者的寄寓，從而掌握閱讀、評鑒中國文學經典之方法。  
3.   學習撰寫學術研究報告的基礎知識從而改善寫作能力。
courses.course_syllabus:
|  | Introduction: Plants and Human Civilization | 導論︰植物與人類文明 |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  | Plants and Folklore | 植物與民俗節慶 |
|  | Plants as Metaphors | 文學中植物的寄喻 |
|  | Pastoral and Landscape Literature | 田園與山水文學 |
|  | Plants in Religious Literature | 宗教文學中的植物書寫 |
|  | Plants in Painting | 繪畫中的植物 |
|  | Field Work | 田野考察 |
|  | Selected Topics in Plants and Literature | 植物與文學專題 |
|  | Selected Topics in Plants and Literature | 植物與文學專題 |
|  | Selected Topics in Plants and Literature | 植物與文學專題 |
|  | Selected Topics in Plants and Literature | 植物與文學專題 |
|  | Selected Topics in Plants and Literature | 植物與文學專題 |
|  | Summary | 課程總結 |
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 教師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。
3. 利用導修報告處理部分教學單元，俾學生主動學習，加強學生與教師之間的教學互動。
4. 利用網上討論，加強學生與教師之間的教學互動。
5. 通過學習、習作及論文撰寫，了解學生的表現。
6. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Appreciation of Masterpieces of Classical Chinese Literature
courses.description: This course is designed for high-school language teachers, focusing on guided reading and explication of important texts selected from various genres of traditional literature. It is expected that a close reading of these texts will help students improve their understanding of traditional aesthetics, sharpen their sense and sensibility and master the methodologies of analyzing literary texts of different genres and styles. 1) Poetry: 1.1 Origins, development and characteristics of traditional poetry; 1.2 Old-style poetry; 1.3 Modern-style poetry; 1.4 Song lyrics; 1.5 Anthologies and their studies. 2) Prose: 2.1 Origins, development and characteristics of traditional prose; 2.2 Ancient-style prose of the pre-Qin era and Han Dynasties; 2.3 Ancient-style prose of Tang and Song Dynasties; 2.4 Informal essays of Ming and Qing Dynasties; 2.5 Anthologies and their studies. 3) Drama: 3.1 Origins, development and characteristics of traditional drama; 3.2 Zaju; 3.3 Chuanqi; 3.4 Anthologies and their studies. 4) Fiction: 4.1 Origins, development and characteristics of traditional fiction; 4.2 Short stories; 4.3 Novels; 4.4 Traditional fiction commentaries and their studies.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學生能够：   
   
1. 熟悉中國古典文學經典作品，了解各種文體之特徵。  
   
2. 提高文學鑑賞能力。  
   
3. 掌握賞析文學作品方法。
courses.course_syllabus:
(1) 古典詩詞名篇鑑賞  
   
1.1 詩詞格律原理  
   
1.2 名家詩詞選讀  
   
(2) 古典文章名篇鑑賞  
   
2.1 文章體式辨別  
   
2.2 散體及韻文選讀  
   
(3) 戲曲小說名著鑑賞  
   
3.1 戲曲選讀  
   
3.2 小說選讀
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3. 利用課堂小測考量學生的進度及學習進度。  
   
4. 利用導修處理部分教學單元，俾學員主動學習，加強學員及導師之間的教學互動。  
   
5. 通過學習及考試，了解學員的整體表現及其進境。  
   
6. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。
courses.required_readings:
(1) 李白(〈夢遊天姥吟留別〉、〈古風〉、〈蜀道難〉等) 、杜甫(〈自京赴奉先縣詠懷五百字〉、〈詠懷古跡五首〉、〈秋興八首〉等) 、白居易(〈長恨歌〉、〈新樂府〉等)、李商隱(〈無題〉、〈錦瑟〉等)、黃庭堅(〈寄黃幾復〉) 、吳梅村(〈圓圓曲〉)等名家古近體詩作。  
   
(2) 溫庭筠(〈菩薩蠻〉、〈更漏子〉等)、韋莊(〈菩薩蠻〉)、馮延巳(〈蝶戀花〉)、李煜(〈虞美人〉、〈浪淘沙〉等)、柳永(〈八聲甘州〉、〈雨霖鈴〉等)、蘇軾(〈江城子〉、〈念奴嬌〉等)、辛棄疾(〈永遇樂〉、〈水龍吟〉等)、李清照(〈聲聲慢〉)、王國維(〈菩薩蠻〉)等名家詞作。  
   
(3)《戰國策‧馮諼客孟嘗君》、王勃(〈秋日登洪府滕王閣餞別詩序〉)、韓愈(〈送董邵南序〉、〈送孟東野序〉等)、柳宗元(「永州八記」、〈種樹郭橐駝傳 〉等)、 歐陽修(〈秋聲賦〉、〈朋黨論〉等)、蘇軾(〈留侯論〉、〈前赤壁賦〉等)、姚鼐(〈復魯潔非書〉)等名家古文。  
   
(4) 施耐庵(《水滸傳》)、 羅貫中(《三國演義》)、 吳承恩(《西遊記》)、蘭陵笑笑生(《金瓶梅》)、曹雪芹(《紅樓夢》)、湯顯祖(《牡丹亭》)、馮夢龍(《喻世明言》、《警世通言》、《醒世恒言》)、凌濛初(《初刻拍案驚奇》、《二刻拍案驚奇》)、洪昇(《長生殿》)等名家小說戲曲。

二. 梁蕭統編，唐李善注：《文選》，上海：上海古籍出版社，1986年。  
   
三. 錢鍾書選註：《宋詩選注》，北京：人民文學出版社，1982年。  
   
四. 中國社會科學院文學硏究所編：《唐宋詞選》，北京：人民文學出版社，1981年。  
   
五. 王力著 ：《詩詞格律》，香港：中華書局(香港)有限公司, 2002年。  
   
六. 王起主編：《中國戲曲選》（三冊），北京：人民文學出版社, 1985 年。  
   
七. 湯顯祖著，徐朔方、楊笑梅校注：《牡丹亭》，北京：人民文學出版社，1978年。.  
   
八. 馮夢龍、凌濛初編著：《三言二拍》，北京：北京出版社，2006年。  
   
九. 各種版本之《水滸傳》、《三國演義》、《西遊記》、《金瓶梅》、《紅樓夢》。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Appreciation of Masterpieces of Modern Chinese Literature
courses.description: This course is designed for high-school language teachers. It aims at enhancing their skills in and knowledge of appreciating and teaching modern Chinese literature from aesthetic, historical and cultural perspectives. Major works of fiction, poetry, prose and drama will be discussed, strategies of textual interpretation explored, and formal characteristics and central themes of modern Chinese literature expounded. Key reference works will also be introduced.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學員能够：   
   
1. 從文學史、美學、文化等角度鑑賞現代文學作品。  
   
2. 掌握現代文學內容及形式之基本特色。  
   
3. 掌握講授現代文學之技巧。
courses.course_syllabus:
1) Introduction: 1.1.The Origins and development of modern Chinese literature; 1.2. Methodologies analyzing modern Chinese literature; 1.3. Major reference works; 2) Fiction: 2.1 Traditional and modern fiction: similarities and differences; 2.2 Selected readings of modern novels; 2.3 Selected readings of modern short stories; 3) Poetry: 3.1 Traditional and modern poetry: similarities and differences; 3.2 Selected readings of various schools of modern poetry; 4) Prose: 4.1 Traditional and modern prose: similarities and differences; 4.2 Selected readings of various schools of modern essays; 5) Drama: 5.1 Traditional and modern drama: similarities and differences; 5.2 Selected readings of various schools of modern drama  
   
一）概論：1.1 現代文學之起源及演變；1.2 現代文學作品閱讀及詮釋方法；1.3 重點參考書介紹； 二）小說：2.1 現代小說與古典小說之異同；2.2 長篇小說選讀及評鑒；2.3 短篇小說選讀及評鑒； 三）新詩：3.1 新詩與古典詩之異同；3.2 重要流派新詩選讀及評鑒；四）散文：4.1 現代散文與古典散文之異同；4.2 重要流派散文選讀及評鑒；五）戲劇：5.1 現代戲劇與古典戲劇之異同；5.2 重要流派戲劇選讀及評鑒
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3. 利用課堂小測考量學生的進度及學習進度。  
   
4. 利用導修處理部分教學單元，俾學員主動學習，加強學員及導師之間的教學互動。  
   
5. 通過學習及考試，了解學員的整體表現及其進境。  
   
6. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。
courses.required_readings:
1. 夏志清著，劉紹銘等譯：《中國現代小說史》，香港：中文大學出版社，2001年。C.T. Hsia, A History of Modern Chinese Fiction, Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 3rd ed, 1999.  
   
2. 馬森：《戲劇：造夢的藝術》，台北：麥田出版社，2000年。  
   
3. 陳義芝編：《散文教室》，台北：九歌出版社，2002年。  
   
4. 趙家璧主編：《中國新文學大系1918-1927》(小說集一至三集)，上海：上海良友圖書公司，1936年。  
   
5. 錢理群、溫儒敏、吳福輝：《中國現代文學三十年》(修訂版)，北京：北京大學出版社，1998年。  
   
6. 羅青：《從徐志摩到余光中》，台北：爾雅出版社，1978年。
courses.recommended_readings:
1. 王德威：《閱讀當代小說：台灣‧大陸‧香港‧海外》，台北：遠流出版事業股份有限公司，1991年。  
   
2. 李歐梵著，李歐梵、毛尖譯：《上海摩登：一種新都市文化在中國1930-1945》，北京：北京大學出版社，2001年。  
   
3. 陳白塵、董健主編：《中國現代戲劇史稿》，北京：中國戲劇出版社，1989 年。  
   
4. 陸耀東：《中國新詩史（1916－1949）》(第一卷、第二卷)，武漢：長江文藝出版社，2005－2009 年。  
   
5. 盧瑋鑾編：《不老的繆思：中國現當代散文理論》，香港：天地圖書有限公司，1993年。  
   
6. 嚴家炎：《中國現代小說流派史》，北京：人民文學出版社，1995年。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Selected Readings in the Classics of Ancient Texts
courses.description: This course is designed for high-school language teachers. It aims at enhancing their skills in and knowledge of appreciating the Confucian classics (jing), historical writings (shi) and philosophical treatises (zi) through guided readings of canonical texts. Traditional annotations, vernacular translations, excavated texts and modern reference books will be utilized in the explication of these texts and their tenets. 1) Selected readings in Confucian texts: 1.1 Selected readings of the Five Classics; 1.2 Annotations and commentaries of the Han and Tang Dynasties; 1.3 Modern vernacular translations; 1.4 Excavated texts; 1.5 Major reference books on Confucian texts; 2) Selected Readings in Philosophical Treatises: 2.1 Selected Readings of philosophical texts of various school (focusing on Daoist and Legalist texts); 2.2 Traditional annotations; 2.3 Modern vernacular translations; 2.4 Excavated texts; 2.5 Major reference books on philosophical treatises; 3) Selected Readings in Historical Writings: 3.1 Selected readings of four canonical works (focusing on Records of the Grand Historian and History of the Former Han Dynasty); 3.2 Traditional annotations; 3.3 Modern vernacular translations; 3.4 Major reference books on historical writings
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學員能够：   
   
1. 掌握閱讀、評鑒古代文獻之方法。  
   
2. 掌握古代文獻之內容特質。  
   
3. 理解傳世文獻與出土文獻之關係。
courses.course_syllabus:
一、經部文獻選讀   
　1.「經部」釋義  
   
　2.《詩經》選讀  
   
　3.《論語》選讀  
   
　4.《孟子》選讀  
   
二、史部文獻選讀   
　1.「史部」釋義  
   
　2.《史記》選讀  
   
　3.《漢書》選讀  
   
三、子部文獻選讀   
　1.「子部」釋義  
   
　2.《孫子兵法》選讀  
   
　3.《老子》選讀
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。

4. 利用導修處理部分教學單元，俾學員主動學習，加強學員及導師之間的教學互動。

6. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Introduction to Classical Chinese
courses.description: An introduction to various characteristic features of Classical Chinese. Topics include Chinese character, vocabulary, grammar and phonology. Major reference works will be also examined.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學員能够：   
   
1. 認識漢字形音義的各種關係。  
   
2. 掌握詞義辨析的方法。  
   
3. 了解古漢語語法的基本規律。  
   
4. 認識古漢語語音的特點。
courses.course_syllabus:
1) Chinese characters; 1.1 Structure of Chinese characters; 1.2 Ancient and new characters, original and variant forms, loan characters; 1.3 Extension in usage; 1.4 Reference books on characters; 2) Vocabulary; 2.1 Components of words; 2.2 Synonyms and cognates; 2.3) Meaning of words; 2.4 Reference books on vocabulary; 3) Grammar; 3.1 Parts of speech and sentence patterns; 3.2 Free usage of parts of speech; 3.3 Ellipsis and word order; 3.4 Reference works on grammar; 4) Phonology; 4.1 Old Chinese and Middle Chinese; 4.2 Evolution of sounds (or Historical phonology); 4.3 Special pronunciations in ancient texts; 4.4 Reference books on phonology  
   
一）文字； 1.1 漢字的結構；1.2 古今字、異體字、本字、假借字； 1.3 引申義和假借義； 1.4 文字工具書；二）詞匯；2.1 詞匯成分；.2 同義詞、同源詞； 2.3 詞義的辨析； 2.4 詞匯工具書；三）語法； 3.1 詞類和句式； 3.2 詞類的活用； 3.3 省略和語序； 3.4 語法工具書；四）語音；4.1 上古音、中古音； 4.2 語音的演變；4.3 古書中字詞的特殊讀音；4.4 語音工具書
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。

5. 通過學習及考試，了解學員的整體表現及其進境。

1. 周斌武：《中國古代語言學文選》。上海：上海古籍出版社，1988年。  
   
2. 洪誠：《中國歷代語言文字學文選》。南京：江蘇人民出版社，1982年。  
   
3. 胡奇光：《中國小學史》。上海：上海人民出版社，1987年。  
   
4. 張世祿主編：《古代漢語教程》(重訂本)。上海：復旦大學出版社，2005年。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Introduction to Modern Chinese
courses.description: This course provides a general survey of modern Chinese, including its sounds, vocabulary and grammar. Attention will also be given to the structure and development of Chinese characters. Students will acquire a comprehensive understanding of the language and will be adequately prepared for future explorations in linguistic studies.
courses.learning_outcomes:
預期修畢本科後，學員能够：   
   
1. 認識現代漢語的聲、韻、調系統。  
   
2. 辨析語素、字、詞的異同。  
   
3. 掌握詞義辨析的原理。  
   
4. 掌握現代漢語基本的語法特點。  
   
5. 認識漢字的造字原理、字體的演變和繁簡字的對應。
courses.course_syllabus:
1) Phonology: 1.1 Phonological system of modern Chinese; 1.2 The Pinyin romanization system; 1.3 Tones and recitation; 2) Vocabulary: 2.1 Morephemes, words and vocabulary; 2,2 Components of words; 2.3 Polysemes, synonyms and antonyms; 3) Grammar: 3.1 Parts of speech; 3.2 Phrases; 3.3 Sentences and Their Components; 3.4 Compound Sentences; 4) Chinese characters writing system: 4.1 Characteristics and Components of Chinese characters; 4.2 Evolution of Chinese characters and scripts; 4.3 Codification of Chinese characters and scripts  
   
一）語音： 1.1 現代漢語的語音系統；1.2 漢語拼音方案；1.3 語調和朗讀；二）詞匯：2.1 語素、詞、詞匯；2.2 詞的構造； 2.3 多義詞、同義詞、反義詞；三）語法：3.1 詞類；3.2 短語；3.3 句子和句子成分；3.4 複句；四）文字： 4.1 漢字的特點和結構； 4.2 漢字的發展； 4.3 漢字的規範
courses.feedback_evaluation:
1. 導師經常徵詢學生對授課進度、課程設計、教學方式及個人學習的意見，俾能及時調整教學方針。  
   
2. 為學習出現問題的學生提供個別輔導。  
   
3. 利用課堂小測考量學生的學習進度。  
   
4. 利用導修處理部分教學單元，俾學員主動學習，加強學員及導師之間的教學互動。  
   
5. 通過學習及考試，了解學員的整體表現及其進境。  
   
6. 通過教學問卷調查，全面了解學生對本科教學的意見。
courses.required_readings:
1. 朱德熙：《語法講義》。北京：商務印書館，1982。  
   
2. 朱德熙：《語法答問》。北京：商務印書館，1999。  
   
3. 朱德熙：《語法分析講稿》。北京：商務印書館，2010。  
   
4. 沈家煊：《語法六講》。北京：商務印書館，2011。  
   
5. 張斌：《現代漢語語法十講》。上海：復旦大學出版社，2005。  
   
6. 趙元任：《漢語口語語法》(呂叔湘譯本)。北京：商務印書館，1979。
courses.recommended_readings:
1. 胡裕樹主編：《現代漢語》(增訂本)，香港：三聯書店，1992年。

courses.subject: CHLT
courses.title: Introduction to Chinese Classic Texts and Culture
courses.description: This course aims at illustrating the relationship between Chinese classic texts and Chinese culture. Through discussions of important passages in Confucian and Daoism, students can have a general picture of these philosophical schools and comprehend special features of Chinese tradition, beliefs, and values.
courses.learning_outcomes:
Upon completion of this module, students should be able to:  
   
1.　To read, understand, and assess Chinese classic texts.  
   
2.　To obtain special features of Chinese classic texts.  
   
3.　To grasp various aspects of Chinese tradition and culture.  
   
   
預期修畢本科目後，學員能够：   
1.　掌握閱讀、評鑒中國古代經典之方法。  
   
2.　掌握中國古代經典之內容特質。  
   
3.　理解中國傳統文化精神之特質。
courses.course_syllabus:
Course Outline:  
   
1.　Introduction: The relationship between Chinese classic texts and Chinese culture  
   
2.　Texts of Confucianism (mainly The Analects & The Mencius)  
   
2.1　Confucian values and its influences on Chinese culture  
   
3.　Texts of Daoism (mainly Daodejing and Zhuangzi)  
   
3.1　Daoistic values and its influences on Chinese culture  
   
   
科目大綱：   
1.　導論：中國古代經典與中國文化之關係;   
2.　儒家經典選讀(重點介紹：《論語》、《孟子》)  
   
2.1　概論儒家文化精神及其價值  
   
3　道家經典選讀(重點介紹：《老子》、《莊子》)  
   
3.1　概論道家文化精神及其價值
